025package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener;
026
027/**
028 * An interface to indicate that the class has multiple {@link Listener}s.
029 * <p>
030 * Example:
031 *
032 * <pre>{@code
033 *     public class SampleListeners implements MultipleListeners {
034 *         @Subscribe
035 *         public void onEventNormal(@NotNull Event event) {
036 *             // do something
037 *         }
038 *
039 *         @Subscribe(priority = Priority.HIGH_VALUE)
040 *         public void onEventHigh(@NotNull Event event) {
041 *             // do something
042 *         }
043 *     }
044 * }</pre>
045 * <p>
046 * The requirements for methods to be subscribed
047 * by {@link com.github.siroshun09.event4j.bus.EventBus#subscribeAll} are the following:
048 * <ol>
049 * <li>The method is annotated with the {@link Subscribe} annotation.</li>
050 * <li>Not an inherited method from parent classes or interfaces.</li>
051 * <li>The number of arguments is 1, and the type of the argument inherits
052 * from event class of the {@link com.github.siroshun09.event4j.bus.EventBus} to subscribed.</li>
053 * </ol>
054 */
055public interface MultipleListeners {
056}
